description: This pathway describes the transcription activation (RNA-polymerase I and KAT2A/B) and inhibition (NuRD complex)in general. These processes are involved in the Tessadori-Bicknell-van Haaften syndrome 3 (TEBINVAD) - for an overview of this syndrome see [WP5575](http://wikipathways.org/instance/WP5575).
title: Transcription activation (RNA-polymerase I and KAT2A/B) and inhibition (NuRD complex)
